channel.title: Video Interview on A fractal spectrum of tales
channel.description: Recent content in Video Interview on A fractal spectrum of tales

item.title: Edward Snowden interviewed by the NDR channel
item.description: Few days ago the German TV Channel NDR did an exclusive interview with Edward Snowden. I find it quite interesting, both for getting to know Snowden and have a fast overview of many of the scandals that were made public by some of the published leaks. I was very disappointed the last time I went back home in Italy to know that nobody cared and almost nobody knew about what was and is happening.
